keyMoments.title: Nami's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Nami introduces herself to Luffy as a thief who specializes in robbing pirates, revealing her goal of collecting 100 million Berries.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of Nami, who will become the Straw Hat Pirates' navigator and one of the core crew members.
keyMoments.quote: I'm a thief who specializes in robbing pirates. I hate pirates!

keyMoments.title: Nami Betrays Luffy
keyMoments.description: Nami ties up Luffy and hands him over to the Buggy Pirates to gain Buggy's trust.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Nami's morally complex character and her willingness to do whatever it takes to achieve her mysterious goal.
keyMoments.quote: This is the pirate I used to work for. I'm offering him to you as a gift.

keyMoments.title: Nami Refuses to Kill Luffy
keyMoments.description: When ordered to fire a Buggy Ball at Luffy, Nami refuses and extinguishes the fuse with her bare hands, burning herself.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Nami's true moral compass - she may be a thief, but she won't kill innocent people. Foreshadows her eventual alliance with Luffy.
keyMoments.quote: I refuse! I won't kill him!

relationships.description: Nami initially betrays Luffy but shows she won't let him be killed, establishing a complex dynamic.

evolutionMoments.description: Nami meets Luffy and betrays him to Buggy, but refuses to kill him when ordered.

reveals.information: Wants to collect 100 million Berries (reason not yet revealed)
Morally gray character willing to betray but unwilling to kill

keyMoments.title: Buggy the Clown's Introduction
keyMoments.description: Buggy is introduced as the fearsome pirate captain terrorizing Orange Town with his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Buggy, who becomes one of the most recurring characters in One Piece, eventually becoming a Warlord and Emperor.
keyMoments.quote: I am the great Captain Buggy!

keyMoments.title: Buggy Ball Demonstration
keyMoments.description: Buggy demonstrates the destructive power of his special Buggy Ball cannonball, destroying an entire row of houses.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Buggy as a serious threat with devastating weaponry.
keyMoments.quote: Witness the power of my special Buggy Ball!

keyMoments.title: Bara Bara no Mi Powers Revealed
keyMoments.description: Buggy reveals he ate the Bara Bara no Mi, allowing him to split his body into pieces and control them independently.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the Bara Bara no Mi Devil Fruit powers, the second Devil Fruit shown in the series.
keyMoments.quote: I ate the Bara Bara no Mi! I'm a splitting man!

bounties.reason: Pirate captain terrorizing East Blue towns

abilities.description: Buggy separates his body parts and controls them independently, allowing him to avoid attacks and strike from unexpected angles.
A special explosive cannonball with massive destructive power, capable of destroying multiple buildings.

relationships.description: Buggy views Luffy as an enemy after Nami hands him over and he becomes a threat to his operations.

evolutionMoments.description: Buggy accepts Luffy as a prisoner from Nami and prepares to execute him.

relationships.description: Zoro attacks Buggy to rescue Luffy, establishing them as enemies.

evolutionMoments.description: Zoro attacks Buggy with his swords, starting their battle.

reveals.information: Ate the Bara Bara no Mi Devil Fruit
Possesses Buggy Balls - extremely destructive cannonballs
Cruel, theatrical pirate who terrorizes towns for fun and profit
